articles.title: France's Macron hosts Tajik leader for talks on Afghanistan - Guardian

articles.title: '3 checks in 10 minutes': Some confusion at hawker centres, coffee shops as stricter Covid-19 rules begin - AsiaOne

articles.title: 2409 travellers from eight countries approved to enter Singapore under Vaccinated Travel Lane - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): More than 2,000 travellers have been granted a pass to enter Singapore under a quarantine-free travel scheme, after the first day of applications opening for visitors from eight countries.
